Text.Text: Eh?  Who... who are you?
I am Imphraili Asserbai of Tyranturos.  I do research for the school of transmutation, as should be clear from the beasts in the cages.
*Khas.*  If that is the case, please leave my laboratory.  Whatever mysterious reason you have to be down here, stay away from the Viciscamera or you'll regret it.

Truly?  That's unfortunate, because I really don't care what you think.  The philosophy of transmutation magic revolves around change and experimentation.  I don't need your druidic circle's seal of approval.
Hah-hah-hah, you're a...  WHAT?!
Well, things are progressing very well.  The Viciscamera is able to transform captive drow with little difficulty.  There are only a few difficulties, which I already informed Saablic of.

I thank you.  The location is less than ideal, but I have a level of freedom here I would never have enjoyed in Thay.  Many others have joined with my master, Saablic Tan, for such freedom to experiment.
Hm.  I have a feeling that you really aren't supposed to be down here.  I have a lot of work to do, so I'm not going to stand around and interrogate you.  Just... stay away from the Viciscamera.
Yes.  I am a wizard in the school of transmutation and a member of the Researcher political faction.  Many of the Thayans here are.

The Viciscamera?  It's a magical creature that transforms drow into driders without the assistance of the yochlols, the so-called Handmaidens of Lolth.  I know everything about it - I created it with Saablic Tan.  Why?

Oh.  These are my latest experiments in alternate dridrae lifeforms.  The twitching one is a celeridrider.  His Viciscamera pod was modified to replicate a quickling's supernatural speed and metabolism.
The other male is a spithdrider.  He isn't as strong as he should be because his exoskeleton is thinner.  He can cast webs from all of his legs, which is the point of the experiment.

The bloated female shifting around in her cage is a cradoldrider.  She carries spiders with her in her abdomen.  I'm not sure how useful she would be.  She's so slow that she can't keep up with others, and she can't spin webs.

It is a creature... well, a creature in a chamber.  The Viciscamera is really just a series of pods and a central body that transforms drow into driders without the assistance of the yochlols, the so-called Handmaidens of Lolth.  Saablic Tan assisted in its creation.
That's... interesting.  Listen, paladin, I'm just here to do research.  I really don't care about Isair and Madae's political aspirations.

In brief, the major problems are still with the creatures' system of nerves and muscles.  Our process has to transform their muscles back and forth through interaction with the Viciscamera pods - it leaves them particularly vulnerable to electricity.
Fine.  Just be careful around the Viciscamera.  When the driders hatch, they are extremely hungry.  Now, if you'll excuse me, I have a great deal of work to do.
Hm?  Oh, Saablic is my master.  He's a Red Wizard of Thay, like me.  He's also a Researcher, which is why he left Thay so many years ago.  I'm lucky to have found him.
Well, myself included, there are several dozen.  Saablic has attracted many eager Red Wizard Researchers who are glad to be free of their Imperialist masters' scheming.
It is one of the two major political groups in Thay.  The Researchers believe that the focus of the Red Wizards should remain primarily on research of magical theory and practice...
The other group, the Imperialists, believe that we should hurl all of our resources at Aglarond and Rashemen in the hope that they will eventually give up or self-destruct.  Foolishness.

Wh- WHAT?!  You idiot!  You complete fool, buffoon --  MORON!  Do you not have any idea about what the Viciscamera represents?  This has never before been accomplished on Faerï¿½n!  GAH!  GO BACK TO RASHEMEN, STONEHEAD!
Well, fine, just don't investigate it too closely.  The driders will attack on sight if you happen to be standing nearby when they hatch.  Now, if you'll excuse me, I have a great deal of work to do.
Yes?  It was lovely chatting with you before, but I am quite busy.
You!  Stop that!  Get away from my laboratory.  I can't have strangers muddling about with those reagents and fouling them with impurities.

Well... yes, thank you.  *Kas.*  Fine, use it as you will - just take great care with my materials.  And don't scatter my notes; they look muddled but are in fact quite organized.  Now, if you'll excuse me...
I'm <CHARNAME>.  Who are you?
Who I am is none of your concern.
I am <CHARNAME>.  As a druid, the sight of whatever abominations you have created here sickens me.
I am <CHARNAME>, a paladin and agent of the Ten-Towns.
We are in the employ of Isair and Madae.  We've come to... check on your progress.
I am a fellow practitioner of the Art.  You have quite a laboratory here.
No one in particular... farewell.
Your tattoos... you are from Thay?
Who is Saablic Tan?
What do you know about a device that transforms drow into driders?
What *are* those things in the cages?
Farewell.
Farewell.
Who are you?
Who is Saablic Tan?
What is the Viciscamera?
What do you know about a device that transforms drow into driders?
What *are* those things in the cages?
Farewell.
Who are you?
What do you know about a device that transforms drow into driders?
What *are* those things in the cages?
Farewell.
I'm a paladin and an agent of the Ten-Towns.  I'm on my way to the Severed Hand to deal with Isair and Madae.
We have not been informed of those difficulties.  Please tell us...
Who are you?
Who is Saablic Tan?
What do you know about a device that transforms drow into driders?
What *are* those things in the cages?
Farewell.
What is the Researcher faction?
Many?  How many are there?
Who is Saablic Tan?
What do you know about a device that transforms drow into driders?
What *are* those things in the cages?
Farewell.
Farewell.
I came here to destroy it.
Professional curiosity.  I happened across the rumor and thought I would investigate.
I was merely curious.
Who are you?
Your tattoos... you are from Thay?
Who is Saablic Tan?
What do you know about a device that transforms drow into driders?
Farewell.
Farewell.
That's interesting.  I'd like to see it.
Who are you?
Who is Saablic Tan?
What *are* those things in the cages?
Farewell.
Who are you?
What do you know about a device that transforms drow into driders?
What *are* those things in the cages?
Farewell.
Who are you?
Who is Saablic Tan?
Interesting.  We're going to have a look around now.  Farewell.
Who are you?
Your tattoos... you are from Thay?
What do you know about a device that transforms drow into driders?
What *are* those things in the cages?
Farewell.
Farewell.
What is the Researcher faction?
Who is Saablic Tan?
What do you know about a device that transforms drow into driders?
What *are* those things in the cages?
Farewell.
Farewell.
How many Thayans are here?
Who is Saablic Tan?
What do you know about a device that transforms drow into driders?
What *are* those things in the cages?
Farewell.
Farewell.
Who are you?
You have a great number of tattoos.  Are you from Thay?
Who is Saablic Tan?
What do you know about a device that transforms drow into driders?
What *are* those things in the cages?
Farewell.
It's an impressive collection for so small an area.  As a... ah... transmuter... myself, I must say I'm impressed.
It's an impressive collection for so small an area.  As a transmuter myself, I must say I'm impressed.
Farewell.
